officialTitle: Role of Oral Celecoxib 200 mg in Reducing Pain Associated With Colposcopic Directed Biopsy: A Randomized Triple-blind Placebo-controlled Trial
inclusionCriteria:
• Females 18-65 years old who undergoing colposcopic directed biopsy
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* A known allergy to Celecoxib, aspirin or another NSAID.
* Active peptic ulceration or gastrointestinal bleeding.
* Inflammatory bowel disease.
* Congestive heart failure (NYHA II-IV).
* Established ischemic heart disease, peripheral arterial disease and/or cerebrovascular disease.
* History of neurologic deficit.
* Known hepatic or renal impairment.
* Pregnancy.
* Breast-feeding.
* Post-hysterectomy.
* Bleeding disorders.
* Drug abuse.
* Cervical and vaginal infection.
